summary.para: Contains parameters that describe the licensing behavior of a class factory that supports licensing. The structure is filled by calling the method.
The size of the structure, in bytes.

Indicates whether this class factory allows the creation of its objects on an unlicensed machine through the use of a license key. If TRUE, can be called to obtain the key. If FALSE, objects can be created only on a fully licensed machine.

Indicates whether a full machine license exists such that calls to and will succeed. If TRUE, the full machine license exists. Thus, objects can be created freely. and a license key is available if fRuntimeKeyAvail is also TRUE. If FALSE, this class factory cannot create any instances of objects on this machine unless the proper license key is passed to .
